location.name: Fuchsia City
location.des: A historic village that has become new.

place.des:
The Safari Zone is a special Pokémon preserve where Trainers can enter to capture certain types of Pokémon. It is owned by the Warden. For
PokémonDollar 500, the player will receive 30
Safari Balls. With a large area to cover, Trainers must plan out their destination so as to arrive in time to capture all the Pokémon they want.

There are Pokémon on display, including Chansey, Lapras, Voltorb, Kangaskhan, and Slowpoke. In addition, the
Fossil that the player "shares" with the Super Nerd in Mt. Moon appears here as well. It will be a Kabuto if the player chose the
Helix Fossil, and an Omanyte if the player chose the
Dome Fossil.
The Fuchsia Gym is the official Gym of Fuchsia City. It is based on Poison-type Pokémon. The Gym Leader is Koga.
